modName: Ice Lich Daedric Retexture by Ph4nt0M133
summary: Small retexture of The Deadric Armor matching the snowy environment of Skyrim...Both Male and Female.NOW WITH WEAPONS!!!
descriptionHtml:
Optional Weapons Available!!!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------A White and blue Retexture of The Deadric Armor giving it a more appropriate colour to blend in with the snow and ice wastelands.
This Is my First mod and was originally made for me but what the heck hope you guys enjoy it.

Hand Made Textures for the Daedric Armor and Weapons
I used Paint.Net and Mypaint to edit the Textures.
Please Comment if You like the mod,suggestions are welcome.

Installation:
Just Unzip and copy the data folder into your Skyrim Directory. 

Hopefully more mods will be following soon...Like Realistic textures for a Newly slain Dragon\'s Skeleton....
author: Ph4nt0M133
